## Schedule

Note: this schedule is subject to change. Please check for updates frequently.

Also, if the due dates listed here differ from WebCampus, use the date listed on WebCampus! 

```{r include=FALSE}
courseSchedule <- read.csv("CourseSchedule.csv")

```

```{r results='asis', echo=FALSE}
knitr::kable(courseSchedule,caption="",col.names = c("Week","Mon. meeting",
                                                     "Wed. meeting (R mini-lab)","Assignments"))

```
